pullRequest.title: Invoice, ventilation process unit check
pullRequest.bodyText:
When ventilating an invoice, when checking if the stockMoveQties are right, check if the unit is not the same and convert units to compare if possile
Add translation

RM #27754 (cherry-pick from 5.3)

commit.message:
Invoice, ventilation process unit check

- When ventilating an invoice, when checking if the stockMoveQties are right, check if the unit is not the same and convert units to compare if possile
- Add translation

RM #27754 (cherry-pick from 5.3)

nodes.bodyText: Better to avoid to use conditional injection in a loop.
